Verses: 1 yosuvaa Aayiyaip Pidiththu, Sangaarampanni, Erigovukkum Adhin Raajaavukkum Seydhabadi, Aayikkum Adhin Raajaavukkum Seydhadhaiyum, Gibiyonin Kudigal Isravelode Samaadhaanampanni Avargalukkul Vaasamaayirukkiradhaiyum, Erusalemin Raajaavaagiya Adhonisedhek Kelvippattapodhu,
2 kibiyon Raajadhaani Pattanangalil Ondraippol Periya Pattanamum, Aayiyaippaarkkilum Peridhumaayirundhapadiyinaalum, Adhin Manusharellaarum Balasaaligalaayirundhapadiyinaalum, Migavum Payandhaargal.

3 aagaiyaal Erusalemin, Raajaavaagiya Adhonisedhek Epironin Raajaavaagiya Okaamukkum, Yarmooththin Raajaavaagiya Peeraamukkum, Laakeesin Raajaavaagiya Yappiyaavukkum, Eklonin Raajaavaagiya Thepeerukkum Aal Anuppi:
4 naangal Kipiyonai Sangarikkumpadi, Neengal Ennidaththil Vandhu, Enakku Thunaiseyyungal; Avargal Yosuvaavodum Isravel Puththirarodum Samaadhaanampanninaargal Endru Solli Anuppinaan.

5 appadiye Erusalemin Raajaa, Epironin Raajaa, Yarmooththin Raajaa, Laakeesin Raajaa, Eklonin Raajaa Engira Emoriyarin Aindhu Raajaakkalum Kootikkondu, Avargalum Avargaludaiya Ellaachchenaigalum Poi, Kibiyonukku Munbaaga Paalayamirangi, Adhinmel Yuththampanninaargal.

6 appozhudhu Kipiyonin Manushar Gilkaalilirukkira Paalayaththukku Yosuvaavinidaththil Aalanuppi: Umadhu Adiyaarai Kaividaamal, Seekkiramaai Engalidaththil Vandhu, Engalai Ratchiththu, Engalukku Thunai Seyyum; Parvadhangalile Kudiyirukkira Emoriyarin Raajaakkalellaarum Engalukku Virodhamaaga Koodinaargal Endru Solla Sonnaargal.
7 udane Yosuvaavum, Avanodekooda Sagala Yuththamanusharum Sagala Baraakkiramasaaligalum Gilkaalilirundhu Ponaargal.
8 karththar Yosuvaavai Nokki: Avargalukku Bayappadaayaaga; Un Kaigalil Avargalai Oppukkoduththen; Avargalil Oruvarum Unakku Munbaaga Nirpadhillai Endraar.
9 yosuvaa Gilkaalilirundhu Raamuzhudhum Nadandhu, Thiteerendru Avargalmel Vandhuvittaan.

10 karththaro Avargalai Isravelukku Munbaaga Kalangappanninaar; Aagaiyaal Avargalai Kibiyonile Magaa Sangaaramaaga Madangadiththu, Peththoronukku Pogira Vazhiyile Thuraththi, Asekkaamattum Makkedhaamattum Muriya Adiththaargal.

11 avargal Peththoronilirundhu Irangugira Vazhiyile Isravelukku Munbaaga Odippogaiyil, Asekkaamattum Odugira Avargalmel Karththar Vaanaththilirundhu Periya Karkalai Vizhappanninaar, Avargal Seththaargal; Isravel Puththirar Pattayaththaal Kondravargalai Paarkkilum Kalmazhaiyinaal Seththavargal Adhigamaayirundhaargal.

12 karththar Emoriyarai Isravel Puththirarukku Munbaaga Oppukkodukkira Annaalile, Yosuvaa Karththarai Nokki Pesi, Pinbu Isravelin Kangalukku Munbaaga: Sooriyane, Nee Kibiyonmelum, Sandhirane, Nee Aayalon Pallaththaakkilum, Thariththunillungal Endraan.

13 appozhudhu Janangal Thangal Saththurukkalukku Needhiyai Sarikkattumattum Sooriyan Thariththadhu, Sandhiranum Nindradhu; Idhu Yaaserin Pusthagaththil Ezhudhiyirukkavillaiyaa; Appadiye Sooriyan Asthamikka Theevirikkaamal, Erakkuraiya Orupagalmuzhudhum Naduvaanaththil Nindradhu.
14 ippadi Karththar Oru Manidhanudaiya Solketta Annaalaiyoththanaal Adharku Munnumillai Adharkuppinnumillai; Karththar Isravelukkaaga Yuththampanninaar.
15 pinbu Yosuvaa Isravel Anaiththodunkooda Gilkaalilirukkira Paalayaththukku Thirumbinaan.
16 andha Aindhu Raajaakkalum Odippoi, Makkedhaavilirukkira Oru Keviyil Oliththukkondaargal.
17 aindhu Raajaakkalum Makkedhaavilirukkira Oru Keviyil Oliththirundhu Agappattaargal Endru Yosuvaavukku Arivikkappattadhu.
18 appozhudhu Yosuvaa: Periya Karkalai Keviyin Vaayile Puratti, Avvidaththil Avargalai Kaavalkaakka Manusharai Vaiyungal.

19 neengalo Nillaamal, Ungal Saththurukkalai Thuraththi, Avargaludaiya Pinpataigalai Vettippodungal; Avargalai Thangal Pattanangalile Piravesikkavottaadhirungal; Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Avargalai Ungal Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaar Endraan.
20 yosuvaavum Isravel Puththirarum Avargalai Magaa Periya Sangaaramaai Avargal Azhiyumalavum Sangariththaargal; Avargalil Meedhiyaanavargal Aranaana Pattanangalukkul Pugundhaargal.
21 janangalellaarum Sugamaai Makkedhaavilirukkira Paalayaththile, Yosuvaavinidaththirku Thirumbivandhaargal; Isravel Puththirarukku Virodhamaaga Oruvanum Than Naavai Asaikkavillai.
22 appozhudhu Yosuvaa: Keviyin Vaayaiththirandhu, Andha Aindhu Raajaakkalaiyum Andha Keviyilirundhu Ennidaththil Veliye Konduvaarungal Endraan.

23 avargal Appadiye Seydhu, Erusalemin Raajaavum, Epironin Raajaavum, Yarmooththin Raajaavum, Laakeesin Raajaavum, Eklonin Raajaavumaagiya Andha Aindhu Raajaakkalaiyum Andha Keviyilirundhu Avanidaththirku Veliye Konduvandhaargal.

24 avargalai Yosuvaavinidaththirku Konduvandhapodhu, Yosuvaa Isravel Manusharaiyellaam Azhaippiththu, Thannodekooda Vandha Yuththamanusharin Adhibadhigalai Nokki: Neengal Kittavandhu, Ungal Kaalgalai Indha Raajaakkaludaiya Kazhuththugalinmel Vaiyungal Endraan; Avargal Kitta Vandhu, Thangal Kaalgalai Avargal Kazhuththugalinmel Vaiththaargal.
25 appozhudhu Yosuvaa Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Bayappadaamalum Kalangaamalum Balaththu Dhidamanadhaayirungal; Neengal Yuththampannum Ungal Saththurukkalukkellaam Karththarippadiye Seyvaar Endraan.
26 adharkuppinbu Yosuvaa Avargalai Vettikkondru, Aindhu Marangalile Thookkippottaan; Saayangaalamattum Marangalil Thonginaargal.

27 sooriyan Asthamikkiravelaiyile, Yosuvaa Avargalai Marangalilirundhu Irakka Kattalaiyittaan. Avargal Oliththukkondirundha Keviyile Avargalai Pottu; Innaalvaraikkum Irukkirapadi Periya Karkalai Keviyin Vaayile Adaiththaargal.

28 annaalile Yosuvaa Makkedhaavaippidiththu, Adhaippattaya Karukkinaal Azhiththu, Adhin Raajaavaiyum Adhilulla Manusharaagiya Sagala Narajeevangalaiyum, Oruvaraiyum Meedhiyaaga Vaikkaamal, Sangaarampanni, Erigovin Raajaavukku Seydhadhupola, Makkedhaavin Raajaavukkum Seydhaan.
29 makkedhaavilirundhu Yosuvaa Isravelar Anaivarodunkooda Lipnaavukku Purappattu, Lipnaavinmel Yuththampanninaan.

30 karththar Adhaiyum Adhin Raajaavaiyum Isravelin Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaar; Adhaiyum Adhilulla Sagala Narajeevangalaiyum, Oruvaraiyum Adhile Meedhiyaaga Vaikkaamal, Pattayakkarukkinaal Azhiththu, Erigovin Raajaavukku Seydhadhupola, Adhin Raajaavukkum Seydhaan.
31 lipnaavilirundhu Yosuvaa Isravel Anaiththodunkooda Laakeesukku Purappattu, Adharku Edhire Paalayam Irangi, Adhinmel Yuththampanninaan.
32 karththar Laakeesai Isravelin Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaar; Adhai Irandaam Naalile Pidiththu, Lipnaavukku Seydhadhupola, Adhaiyum Adhilulla Ellaa Narajeevangalaiyum Pattayakkarukkinaal Azhiththaan.
33 appozhudhu Keserin Raajaavaagiya Oraam Laakeesukku Thunaiseyyumbadi Vandhaan; Yosuvaa Avanaiyum Avan Janaththaiyum Oruvanum Meedhiyaayiraadhabadi, Vettippottaan.
34 laakeesilirundhu Yosuvaavum Isravelar Anaivarum Eklonukku Purappattu, Adharku Edhire Paalayamirangi, Adhinmel Yuththampanni,
35 adhai Annaalile Pidiththu, Adhai Pattayakkarukkinaal Azhiththaargal. Laakeesukku Seydhadhupola,adhilulla Sagala Narajeevangalaiyum Annaaliledhaane Sangaarampanninaan.
36 pinbu Eklonilirundhu Yosuvaavum Isravelar Anaivarumaai Epironukku Purappattu,adhinmel Yuththampanni,

37 adhai Pidiththu, Eklonukku Seydhadhupola, Adhaiyum Adhin Raajaavaiyum Adharku Aduththa Ellaappattanangalaiyum Adhilulla Sagala Narajeevangalaiyum, Oruvaraiyum Meedhiyaaga Vaikkaamal Pattayakkarukkinaal Azhiththaargal; Adhaiyum Adhilulla Sagala Narajeevangalaiyum Sangaarampanninaan.
38 pinbu Yosuvaa Isravelar Anaivarodunkooda Thepeerukku Thirumbippoi, Adhinmel Yuththampanni,

39 adhaiyum Adhin Raajaavaiyum Adhai Serndha Ellaa Pattanangalaiyum Pidiththaan; Avaigalai Pattayakkarukkinaal Azhiththu, Adhilulla Narajeevangalaiyellaam, Oruvaraiyum Meedhiyaaga Vaikkaamal, Sangaarampanninaargal; Epironukkum Lipnaavukkum Avaigalin Raajaavukkum Seydhadhupola Thepeerukkum Adhin Raajaavukkum Seydhaan.

40 ippadiye Yosuvaa Malaidhesam Anaiththaiyum Thendhesaththaiyum Samaboomiyaiyum Neerppaaichchalaana Idangalaiyum Avaigalin Ellaa Raajaakkalaiyum, Oruvaraiyum Meedhiyaaga Vaikkaamal Azhiththu, Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Kattalaiyittapadiye, Suvaasamulla Ellaavatraiyum Sangaarampanni,
41 kaadhesparneyaadhuvakkik Kaadhsaamattum Irukkiradhaiyum Kibiyonmattum Irukkira Gosen Dhesam Anaiththaiyum Azhiththaan.
42 andha Raajaakkal Ellaaraiyum Avargal Dhesaththaiyum Yosuvaa Orumikka Pidiththaan; Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Isravelukkaaga Yuththampanninaar.
43 pinbu Yosuvaa Isravelanaiththodumkooda Gilkaalilirukkira Paalayaththukku Thirumbinaan.
